iarcoCommittee.name: Md Sanaul Haque Shanto
iarcoCommittee.bio: Oversees all aspects of the IARCO competition and YRJ organization.

iarcoCommittee.name: Md. Azmain Yakin Srizon
iarcoCommittee.bio: Md. Azmain Yakin Srizon is an Assistant Professor in the CSE department at RUET. He specializes in deep learning, computer vision, and biomedical engineering, and holds both B.Sc. and M.Sc. degrees from RUET.

mentors.name: Dr. Karthikeyan Parthasarathy
mentors.institution: Head of the Department, Department of Management Studies, Kongu Engineering College
mentors.bio: Dr.Karthikeyan Parthasarathy was awarded Ph.D in Management from Bharathiar University in 2009 and qualified with SET in the year 2006. Presently he is working as an Associate Professor in School of Management Studies at Kongu Engineering College.

mentors.name: Md. Azmain Yakin Srizon
mentors.bio: Md. Azmain Yakin Srizon is an Assistant Professor in the CSE department at RUET. He specializes in deep learning, computer vision, and biomedical engineering, and holds both B.Sc. and M.Sc. degrees from RUET.
